summary: This code sets up two WebDAV directories, one for reading and one for read-write access. It uses the "webdav-cli" tool to connect to a host (10.0.1.6) on ports 8110 and 8111 with root credentials. The first directory is for the "ubuntu_qemu_utm_arm_record" folder, while the second one is for the "recordings" folder within the same path. Different permissions are granted to each directory.

details.comment: This code sets up two WebDAV directories, one for reading and one for read-write access. It uses the "webdav-cli" tool to connect to a host (10.0.1.6) on ports 8110 and 8111 with root credentials. The first directory is for the "ubuntu_qemu_utm_arm_record" folder, while the second one is for the "recordings" folder within the same path. Different permissions are granted to each directory.
details.content:
session_name: kali_prepare_two_webdav_dirs
windows:
  - window_name: dev window
    layout: tiled
    panes:
      - shell_command:
        - "webdav-cli --host=10.0.1.6 --port=8110 --username=root --password=root --path=/media/root/Toshiba\\ XG3/works/agi_computer_control/ubuntu_qemu_utm_arm_record/ --rights=canRead,canGetMimeType,canGetSizecanGetChildren,canGetProperty,canGetProperties,canGetCreationDate,canGetLastModifiedDate,canGetWebName,canGetType"
      - shell_command:
        - "webdav-cli --host=10.0.1.6 --port=8111 --username=root --password=root --path=/media/root/Toshiba\\ XG3/works/agi_computer_control/recordings/ --rights=canCreate,canDelete,canMove,canRename,canAppend,canWrite,canRead,canSource,canGetMimeType,canGetSize,canAddChild,canRemoveChild,canGetChildren,canSetProperty,canGetProperty,canGetProperties,canRemoveProperty,canGetCreationDate,canGetLastModifiedDate,canGetWebName,canGetType"
